page.title: 03Farming
page.content: {Gloddaeth Isaf Farm This farm has an acreage of 165.One farm hand is employed.Livestock consists of :- 200 sheep,100 milking cows and 100 calves.Milking is done twice daily and the average daily production is 1800 litres. Collection to Creamery is once daily. Crops grown include:- grass,silage and potatoes.Farm machinery include 3 tractors and a forage harvester.The Farmer starts work at 6 a.m. The farm has 1 working dog. {Maelgwyn Farm This farm is 6 acres.Livestock consists of :- 60 sheep,2 bullocks, 3 sows and annual average of 18 piglets. Poultry include :- 8 ducks,4 geese and 130 hens.Farm machinery include :- 1 tractor, 1 hay turner and a rotovator. Crops grown are grass(pasture) and hay.
